description: Provide complete janitorial services for multiple buildings located at CFB Halifax for a two-year period with an option to extend the contract by three additional one-year periods. The contract deadline is January 19, 2024. The notice contains a security requirement.

================
**Government Tender Announcement**
================

### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Reference**: WS4157261971
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: December 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. AST
* **Amendment Date**: January 16, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

### Tender Details

* **UNSPSC Categories**: Cleaning and Janitorial Supplies (47130000), Cleaning and Janitorial Services (76110000), and Building Cleaning Services (76111501)
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Trade Agreements**: The procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Services
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entity

* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Cyr, Maryse (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18167397?extsite=MTgxNjczOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence, Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, is seeking offers from qualified contractors to provide janitorial services for multiple buildings located at CFB Halifax. The contract period is two years, with an option to extend for three additional one-year periods
